meanings.definition: A unit of data equal to 1,048,576 bits.
meanings.sent1: I downloaded a megabit of information for my school project.
meanings.sent2: The file size was measured in megabits, making it easy to store.
meanings.sent3: My computer ate up a whole megabit of data in seconds!
meanings.sent4: Her brain processed information at a megabit speed during the exam.
meanings.sent5: The megabit of knowledge transformed his understanding of the topic.

meanings.definition: A unit of data transmission speed equal to one million bits per second.
meanings.sent1: The internet speed was so fast, reaching a megabit per second.
meanings.sent2: The company upgraded their network to handle megabit speeds.
meanings.sent3: I wish my brain could work at a megabit pace during exams!
meanings.sent4: The data flowed through the network at a megabit speed, never slowing down.
meanings.sent5: The megabit rate of transfer amazed everyone in the office.
